Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ayrzul]{Ayrzul}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Baphomet]{Baphomet}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Black Butterfly]{Black Butterfly}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Calistria]{Calistria}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Dhalavei]{Dhalavei}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Erecura]{Erecura}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Hastur]{Hastur}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Kalekot]{Kalekot}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ketephys]{Ketephys}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Mephistopheles]{Mephistopheles}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ng]{Ng}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Norgorber]{Norgorber}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Pillars of Knowledge]{Pillars of Knowledge}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Sivanah]{Sivanah}

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Forced Quiet]{Forced Quiet}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Safeguard Secret]{Safeguard Secret}

You protect secrets and keep them hidden.
name: Secrecy Domain
